participants.name: Jimmy Doan
participants.title: Technical Recruiter at Atrilogy Solutions Group

messages.message:
quick question...

Hi Brian, 

I've noticed a lot of movement (in the Phoenix, Scottsdale, and East valley market) in hiring full stack .NET Software Engineers with your skills and experience. At the moment, I'm partnered with over 4 different well-known companies who are looking for developers with experience in Microsoft .NET (MVC, ASP.NET, C#, SQL Server).

If an amazing opportunity came along, would you be open to hearing more about it?

I'd like to send you details on available positions based on your initial requirements: please complete below and include your email/contact number- I'll only reach out to you on opportunities that meet or exceed your expectations. 

What's your Ideal location?:
Do you prefer Contract, Contract-to-Hire, or Direct Hire?:
Are you open to other positions outside of Arizona? If so, where?: 
Minimum hourly pay or salary requirements?: 


All the Best,

Jimmy Doan
Technical Recruiter at Atrilogy Solutions Group
602.888.0396 | jdoan@atrilogy.com
I would be open to hearing about it.
